reviews.review: You get to spend real money to open some cases which will most likely yield something not worth your time but you will keep opening more in  the hopes of getting something you can be proud of, thus inclining you into gambling addiction. 10/10 would pay again
Жрет время и  нервы... Наркотик хрен бросишь...
Big toxic mosh pit of degenerates
ดีงามพระราม 8
i am in lv with this game anyways i am 1.6 player so it dosent matter
I mean.. It's CSGO. What else is there to it.

durante mi estadia en este juego me gusto mucho la manera en que mejoro pero tambien tiene sus cosas malas tanto como buenas dejare pros y contras:

Pros: 
Buenisimo para jugar con amigos 
te cagas de la risa 
calidad grafica bastante alta
comunidad un tanto buena (q se yo xD)
Contras:
Siempre te va a tocar gente que te insulte o quiera que juegues como ellos 
repleto de hackers
te toca con gente que solo insulta en el micro 
probablemente tambien si juegas sin equipo te toque el tipico equipo llendo de randoms que son todos teams y te terminan hechando.
Фу игра типо говно, читеров много, но играть думаю можно!
One of the most timeless pvp games of all time

It's a great game! The only thing that I would recommend is actually buying it so that you're not stuck with the rest of the F2P plebs ;)

Come join us who have paid for the game!
as bala não pega, não tem como
eu gostei desse jogo eu recomendo
Hit boxes of player models is messed up. View models of players needs to be improved as well.
Played CS since 1.5 and CS:GO in 2019 is by far the best iteration since 1.6 besides the flooding of smurf accounts/hackers since going F2P.

Is super fun ngl. Better with friends, also cool to make new friends with this game. About 3 years ago I met one of my greatest and best friends through this game, we still talk to this day which is awesome.
A classic shooter game where you get to really train to play with a team, and feel rewarded for the time you've put in. but you gotta have a strong heart tho, as there are a lot of cheaters
